dev.simmons.entities

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.simmons.entities.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The object representing a client in the underlying database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client()
      Default constructor that randomly generates a 16 byte salt for the client.

    • Method Summary

      Get the currently stored hashed and salted password.

      Retrieves the salt for the given user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client()
        Default constructor that randomly generates a 16 byte salt for the client.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientId

        public int getClientId()
        Gets the client_id representing this client in the database.
        Returns:
        The client_id. Negative and 0 values represent values not in the database and shouldn't be queried.

      • setClientId

        public void setClientId(int clientId)
        Sets the client_id representing this client in the database.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client_id.

      • getClientUsername

        public java.lang.String getClientUsername()
        Get the client's username.
        Returns:
        The client's username.

      • setClientUsername

        public void setClientUsername(java.lang.String clientUsername)
        Set the client's username.
        Parameters:
        clientUsername - The client's username.

      • getClientName

        public java.lang.String getClientName()
        Get the client's name, their given name not the account username.
        Returns:
        The client's name.

      • setClientName

        public void setClientName(java.lang.String clientName)
        Set the client's name, their given name as opposed to the username associated with the account.
        Parameters:
        clientName - The client's name.

      • getClientPassword

        public java.lang.String getClientPassword()
        Get the currently stored hashed and salted password.
        Returns:
        The client's password, if it has been set.

      • setClientPassword

        public void setClientPassword(java.lang.String clientPassword)
        Set the client's password.
        Parameters:
        clientPassword - The previously salted and hashed password.

      • hashClientPassword

        public void hashClientPassword(java.lang.String clientPassword)
        Salts and hashes the plaintext password of the user.
        Parameters:
        clientPassword - The plaintext password.

      • getClientSalt

        public byte[] getClientSalt()
        Retrieves the salt for the given user.
        Returns:
        The byte array of the salt.

      • setClientSalt

        public void setClientSalt(byte[] clientSalt)
        Sets the salt for the given user. *Warning* Changing the password after resetting the salt would be required.
        Parameters:
        clientSalt - A byte-array representing the user's salt.

      • getDiagnostics

        public java.lang.String getDiagnostics()
        Get diagnostic information representing the given client.
        Returns:
        The formatted diagnostic string.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
